H0.text: what are the colors of the netherlands flag. Blue and Yellow

H1.text: what are the colors of the netherlands flag. Green and White

H2.text: what are the colors of the netherlands flag. Purple and Gold

H3.text: what are the colors of the netherlands flag. red

A4.text: The colours of the flag of the Kingdom of the Netherlands are red, white and blue.

A5.text: The exact colour parameters were defined by the Ministry of the Navy as bright vermilion (red), white and cobalt blue.
